localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: There is 46m shares in the $GME float. 150% of the float is short, much of which illegally. Short sellers in unison are losing about $75m for every point GME goes up
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

localize.full_text: $GME的浮动股有4600万股。150%的浮动股是空头，其中大部分是非法的。GME每涨一个点，卖空者一致损失约7500万美元。
$GME的浮動股有4600萬股。150%的浮動股是空頭，其中大部分是非法的。GME每漲一個點，賣空者一致損失約7500萬美元。
